segments.text: I’m struck by how oblivious the adult woman is, lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the water pooling is almost absurd in its severity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What could be more mundane than doing dishes, yet here it feels so chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are a whirlwind of energy, defying the calm outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange tableau of domesticity turned to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sometimes I think adults forget the dark corners of their own homes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies seem to symbolize something lost, a carefree moment disappearing.
segments.speaker: PAR
